text:
Oh, Producer, would you like to see the photos
from when I went mountain climbing?

We talked about how someday
we could all go together...

Going mountain climbing together sounds fun.
When it comes to the charm of mountains...

I understand. The scenery changes
completely depending on the season.

Yeah, in the city,
you can't quite experience that atmosphere.

Yes, indeed.
You can encounter many rare birds too.

Haha, that's true.
With you around, I might notice those things.

Yeah, it's strange how things taste delicious...
even though it's the same as usual.

Hehe, maybe the deliciousness of the mountain air
adds a special flavor to it.
